title: My god Yi and Jax players are going into withdraw.
body: I just had 2 games, one with Jax Jg and one with Yi Jg. Both just would not stop farming. It's like they got there Bloodrazor and Rage Blade but they just kept trying to sate the Bloodrazor. Guys its okay the relentless stack farming is over. You can come out of the Jg and see the sun now.

replies.body:
{{champion:11}} "Yeah, I guess I can go back to actually ganking now!"

{{champion:24}} "But your ganks suck."

{{champion:11}} "Q_Q"
to be fair jax ganks are not much better

Gap closer, hard CC, lots of burst *and* DPS. He's not Lee sin tier for ganks, but he's far and away better than Yi. On a sliding scale, you get:

Yi—————Shyvana——Jax———Lee sin/Elise———Nautilus

Warwick (no ult) --- --- --- --- --- --- Yi —————Shyvana——Jax———Lee sin/Elise/Warwick (ult)———Nautilus


Thought I could contribute a little. Let's keep the chain going!
warwick is good for counter ganks though.
Warwick needs a rework to allow him to gank pre 6 definitely!

THIS GUY FUCKING GETS IT!

{{item:3070}} {{champion:19}} {{item:3070}}

how exactly are Lee and Elise's ganks equal to a lvl 6 warwick?
They actually have to land something and it can go wrong pretty easily, Warwick just presses r...

> [{quoted}](name=UrZedM8,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oJ64xUXL,comment-id=00020000000000000005,timestamp=2016-05-05T04:55:26.962+0000)
>
> how exactly are Lee and Elise's ganks equal to a lvl 6 warwick?
> They actually have to land something and it can go wrong pretty easily, Warwick just presses r...

Elise can just press E and ignore turret shots. Though admittedly that's going to be much harder since you can't juggle turret Aggro anymore.

A good elise player can cross through a turret using rappel without taking a single shot, that hasn't changed.
If anything, the fact that it doesn't juggle is a buff to elise as she can still hold the aggro whilst rappeled and, if my memory of recent changes serves me right, she just holds aggro while not being damaged, right?

It just swaps to another target with no damage fall off. So if she Rappels, the next champion will start taking shots and they will take them at full damage (if she was taking 140% damage from the turret, now the other player is taking 140% damage from the turret).

Gotcha, I misunderstood the idea of "not juggling tower aggro" to mean that it didn't switch until the target left / died.
my bad LOL
Haven't really played much at all lately.. game seems to be falling apart under tencent + ive had Overwatch, Battleborn, and Final exams :P
Warwick can gank without an ult? I thought he just comes to lane and dances.

> [{quoted}](name=RikoZerame,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oJ64xUXL,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-05T01:52:40.156+0000)
>
> Warwick (no ult) --- --- --- --- --- --- Yi —————Shyvana——Jax———Lee sin/Elise/Warwick (ult)———Nautilus
> 
> 
> Thought I could contribute a little. Let's keep the chain going!

Wondering where Aatrox would be in here.....  With the new changes, having a rough time with gold gen and ganking.... T_T {{champion:266}}
DO NOT DISSMISS THE GRAND BAKER OF WA- er...  WHITE BRREEADDD
I feel like people forgot mao exists
He stopped being a jungler quite a while ago due to a combination of jungle changes and changes to him among other things so I've heard.
He can still jungle, he's just so much stronger as a top laner there's no real reason to take him there, similar to Nautilus.
The lower range on his w also made it harder to gank but top lane mao can just come from behind via tp.

''Imagine if I had a REAL devourer!''

''Your Bloodrazor is inferior!''
{{champion:11}} {{champion:24}} Wait, there are other people here?
{{champion:75}} Is this "other people" you speak of a minion?

_Allied jungler comes to gank_

{{champion:75}} Thank you, untargetable jungle stack.  You shall be spared this day.
{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=HighH1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oJ64xUXL,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2016-05-05T02:23:59.816+0000)
>
> {{champion:75}} Is this "other people" you speak of a minion?

With enough stacks yes, yes they are.

You're right.  As a Yi main, I played a custom match to check out the jungle changes.  I legitimately forgot that I don't have to stack devourer anymore and was trying to sate Bloodrazor.  It's just so weird not powerfarming for ~15 minutes.
I mean, Yi should probably still just powerfarm while looking for opportunities to countergank or take objectives.
that's like saying "Nasus, it's okay, you have 100 stacks. You can teamfight now."
What's the "Sun"? Can I stack it?
well both of those champions have fairly weak early games. their niche was weak early. hyper carry late....theres really nothing they can do about it

People don't understand when a champion has weak moments you need to play around, if they are weak at any point they are bad and need to be buffed, if they are good at all times they are too strong and need to be nerfed.
I had 2 games with a Yi jg yesterday, they both farmed their asses off but they also got EVERY SINGLE SCUTTLE, and soloed Dragons early as well. I can't hate this.
Don't hate on our excellent objective playstyle. Some call it withdrawal, other call it good jg...same same...

Some call it being a Trick2G Sub

EDIT: god do overzealous trick subs annoy me
yi and jax are still not typical gank junglers, evwn after completing items, it is better to farm and attempt to counter gank instead of forcing ganks.
Jax is kind of an all-rounder jungler, really. He can gank all game fairly decently compared to Yi, he can split-push, he can clean-up teamfights, etc.

For the most part, a lot of people who were playing devourer champions legitimately know almost nothing about jungling. They just farmed for 15 minutes then ran to lanes to try and kill people. Now that they're not rewarded for doing this, I imagine their success rates will drop quite a bit.

{{champion:45}} 

Fools! Now, bow to the true master of STAX!
{{champion:75}} "You wot?"
{{champion:45}} "Bruh; I stack just by HITTING people. Get on my level."
Get on your level, you don't even reach Nasus's ankles
{{champion:45}} "IS THAT A SHORT JOKE??"
You're so short, you make Peter Dinklage look like Yao Ming
Yeah, but still... not farming feels so weird. Plus farming should be a jg's main source of income
Idunno man, if a Jungler is getting rich off of ganks, wouldn't that be better than him getting rich off of Farming and leaving his team to defend themselves?

Yeah but asking a Yi to seek out a gank unless there is like {{champion:12}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:25}} there to set up is just asking for disaster.
Not many champions out there has 2 kits worth of CC or Burst Damage.

but like many have said in this thread, Yi, Jax, Shyvana and the likes make for excellent countergankers.
I agree
{{champion:24}} "must farm... must farm... ITS NOT OVER YET!!WE GOTTA REACH SATED! Farm. must farm... NEED FARM!
